Detailed Description

Abstract class that supports hash.

This class provides an easy way to support hash function (and consequently TR1 collections) for classes.

To do so one just need to inherit from this class and implements the hash() method accordingly

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Member Function Documentation

virtual size_t TREX::utils::Hashable::hash (  )  const [protected, pure virtual]

hashing method

This method is called by the TR1` hash functor to get the hash value of current instance.

computed hash value
